contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of October, 1996, the above-captioned Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. In accordance with our decision in Commonwealth v. Barud, 545 Pa. 297, 681 A.2d 162 (1996), the judgment of sentence entered by the Court of Common Pleas of Venango County at No. C.R. No. 229-1995 pursuant to 75 Pa.C.S. § 3731(a)(5) is hereby vacated.
